text:
Hi All,
does someone know if the CMS Cert approval will take longer than 7 business days because of the "Global Week of Rest" ?
Hi <@U07AH2ENYTF>, the team should be working through the queue this week, so thank you for your patience as we get back into work after the Global Week of Rest.
<@U02227D27V3> Great, thanks for letting me know !

I am HubSpot beginner.
I am studying about template section and following academy course.
But there is an error for me like "Template at path Section Tutorial/sections/testimonial.html had template type 'landing_page'. Should be 'section'".
I confirmed the type at testimonial.html but the type is section.
Let me know how this error occur.

Hey <@U07BDGD8FK8>
do the very first lines look like this:

```<!--
 templateType: section
 label: Testimonial section
 isAvailableForNewContent: true
 description: A ready to use section for displaying testimonials
-->```
Also sections can only include one(!)
```{% dnd_section 'something', label="Testimonials" %}
...
{% end_dnd_section %}```
part which includes your layout build with several
```{% dnd_row %}
...
{% end_dnd_row %}```
```{% dnd_column %}
...
{% end_dnd_column %}```
```{% dnd_module %}
...
{% end_dnd_module %}```
elements inside the section.

Static modules like
`{% module 'something' path="PATH-TO-MODULE" %}`  won't work from my experience inside those section templates
Does anyone know when is the next *CRM Customization Bootcamp for Developers* happening*?* Thanks in advance.
Great question, I think we’re still trying to pin down dates for it, I’ll ping this thread once we have it sorted out!
